title: Arial Black JAPAN????
content:
Hi guys!  
 Any help in identifying is appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724132054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/05%20copia_5798.jpg)
author: greentable

comments.content:
It looks like Gothic MB101 (ゴシックMB101) by Morisawa.  
 [http://www.morisawa.co.jp/font/fontlist/details/fontfamily008.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724132054/http:/www.morisawa.co.jp/font/fontlist/details/fontfamily008.html "http://www.morisawa.co.jp/font/fontlist/details/fontfamily008.html")
